messages.title: Building a low carbon economy
messages.content: In Brighton, we need more high-skilled jobs. The new Green Investment Bank will help fund the transition to a low carbon economy. We're also already investing in green energy; a new offshore wind farm between Brighton and Newhaven could power 200,000 homes in Sussex by 2020.

messages.title: Your sincerely, Nancy Platts
messages.content: I promise to be a hardworking and passionate MP who puts Brighton first and foremost and fights for a fair future for all. Make sure your vote counts in this vital election.

messages.title: P.S. If you'd rather have a Labour than a Conservative government, vote Labour.
messages.content: A Green or LibDem vote risks letting the Conservatives in through the back door.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Creation of high-skilled jobs, support from the Green Investment Bank, and investment in renewable energy such as an offshore wind farm that could power homes in Sussex.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A Green or LibDem vote risks letting the Conservatives in through the back door.

issues.economy: Creation of high-skilled jobs with the help of the Green Investment Bank.
issues.environment: Investing in green energy; a new offshore wind farm.

housing.content: Investment in renewable energy such as an offshore wind farm that could power homes in Sussex.

leaflet.personalStatement: I promise to be a hardworking and passionate MP who puts Brighton first and foremost and fights for a fair future for all.
